attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over his lengthy career Rod "Do Ya Think I'm Sexy" Stewart has had 62 hit singles in the UK including six number ones.
His fame is worldwide and his unmistakable voice has brought pleasure to millions.
We call upon the Prime Minister to recognize the English-born Scottish singer's contribution to British music and public life by recommending him to Her Majesty The Queen for an honour.
